data.text: Salomɔn ná-guyei.
Toɠa ɗa-nuɓusɛiti tukpɔɠaaleʋe ga telebodai,
Ziilɛigi yei é zeɠe gizeiti ma,
É sɔle fai ɠɛ maanɔɠɔ nuiti bɛ,
Ni nɔ foloi ɠa dɛ toozu, toɠa yɛ vulua,72:5 toɠa yɛ vulua: Eɓulu woo zɛʋɛ wɔlɔmai zu, naa ɠa ga: ta lua è ʋa.
Masagi ɠa ɠɛ eɠɛ tonai é ʋuuzu wozawoliai zu,
Ná-foloiti su, telebodai ɠaa ɠa wɔɔlɔ,
Toɠa masadai ɠɛ é zo kpoloɗɛi ʋa, é zei kpoloɗɛi ʋa,
Nuiti ti zeini teʋebai zu, naati ta ʋilɛ ɲiibiɠa, ti nɔkɔ bu,
Taalasise masagiti ta ziɛ zaama yooiti ma masagiti ta ʋa pɔ bɛ ga maazoloo ganiiti,
Masagiti kpein ta nɔkɔ bu, ti dɛbi,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa bala nui unmɔɔ, nii é kpɔba ɠaiziɛzu,
Toɠa zɛbɛsulala nuiti maawɔinɠa ta bala nuiti,
Toɠa ti unmɔɔ, é ti ɠula toomai ta maanɔɠɔi zu,
Masagi yɛnvui zuɠooza!
Moloi ɠa ʋooʋa zooi zu,
Daaseigi ɠa yɛ ná ɠɔ!
Mamagi ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Eyɛsu ɠɔ, mamagi ɠa GALAGI ʋɛ,
Ʋɛ ɠa Izayi ná-doun zunui, Davide ná-maanɛɛnɛiti kwɛgai ná.
